message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to negotiate from here.

I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to pay that price, and I think it's a fair deal considering the product's value to me is capped at $1500000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is capped at $1500000 and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to walk away. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's the best compromise we can reach.

I'm not willing to go up to $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm only willing to pay $975000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is capped at $1500000.
